g.text: Do Not Cite, Quote or Distribute
Besides issuing labels, the enforcement of standards also needed to be scaled up efficiently. BEE
developed protocols for randomly sampling appliances for testing. Manufacturers were given a fixed
y products that did not meet the standards, failing which they would be penalised and
the test results would be made public.
Assessing the state of technological innovation helps understanding ho
w current efforts and policies are
doing in relation to stated objectives and how we might design policies in order to do better.
Traditionally, input measures such as RD&D investments and output measures such as scientific
because of the successes of specialised R&D efforts
innovation, and because such measures can (relatively) easily obtained and compared. In the realm of
into the innovation process (Box 16.3). Patents counts are a widely used indicator of the outputs of the
innovation process, especially because they are detailed enough to provide information on
classification (Y02) with the European Patent Office (EPO)
related patents as indicator of innovative activities is
(Haščič and Migotto 2015; Jaffe and de Rassenfosse 2017; de
, including the fact that the scope of what are to be considered climate mitigation
inventions is not always clear or straightforward.
ersely, private energy R&D investments and investments by financing firms cannot be precisely
assessed for a number of reasons, including limited reporting and the difficulty of singling out energy
related investments. This inability to precisely quantify
private investments in energy R&D leads to a
patchy understanding of the energy innovation system, and how private energy R&D investments
responds to public energy R&D investments.
Overall, evidence shows that some of the industrial sectors
ant for meeting climate goals (electricity, agriculture and forestry, mining, oil and gas,
are investing relatively small fractions of sales on R&D
American Energy Innovation Council 2017; Jasmab and Pollitt 2005; Sanyal and Cohen 2009; Jamasb
inancing firms also play an important role in the energy innovation process, but data availability is
The venture capital (VC) financing model, used to overcome the “valley of death” in the
, has not been as suitable for hardware start
space: for example, the percentage of exit outcomes in clean
ups was almost half of that in
ups and less than a third of software investments
model and other private finance do not sufficiently cover the need to demonstrate energy technologies
. This greater difficulty in reaching the
market compared to other sectors may have contributed to a reduction in private equity and venture
tal finance for renewable energy technologies after the boom of the late 2000s
